data.comment: The match is underway in Lyon.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Nimes in the half of Lyon.
Can Nimes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lyon's half?
Throw-in Nimes.
In the minute 3, Amaury Delerue signals a Lyon throw-in in Nimes's half.
Nimes's Lamine Fomba gets in a shot on goal at Groupama Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Nimes in their own half.
In the minute 8, In Lyon Lyon attack through Maxwel Cornet. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lyon.
Moussa Dembele's header is off-target for Lyon.
In the minute 10, Nimes have a goal kick.
Nimes to take a throw-in in Lyon territory.
Nimes to take a throw-in in Lyon territory.
In the minute 11, Nimes are pushing forward but Renaud Ripart's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Lyon goal kick.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Amaury Delerue.
In the minute 12, Amaury Delerue signals a Lyon throw-in in Nimes's half.
Goal kick for Lyon at Groupama Stadium.
Amaury Delerue awards Nimes a goal kick.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Lyon in the half of Nimes.
Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 17, Ball safe as Nimes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
Can Lyon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nimes's half?
Lyon's Memphis Depay gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 21, Goal kick for Nimes at Groupama Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 23, Haris Duljevic (Nimes) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Nimes drives forward and Sidy Sarr gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
The match at Groupama Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Maxwel Cornet, who is down injured.
In the minute 26, Can Nimes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lyon's half?
Maxwel Cornet returns to the field for Lyon after picking up a slight injury.
Amaury Delerue signals a Lyon throw-in in Nimes's half.
In the minute 27, Free kick Nimes.
Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Amaury Delerue signals a throw-in for Nimes, close to Lyon's area.
In the minute 31, In Lyon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can Lyon capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Lyon to take a throw-in in Nimes territory.
Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Nimes.
In the minute 34, Maxwel Cornet (Lyon) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Lyon in the half of Nimes.
Free kick for Nimes in the half of Lyon.
Attention is being given to Nimes’s Zinedine Ferhat and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 38, Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
Zinedine Ferhat is back on the pitch.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
In the minute 40, In Lyon, Bruno Guimaraes of Lyon is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Amaury Delerue.
Nimes's Zinedine Ferhat is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 41, Corner awarded to Nimes.
Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nimes have been awarded a corner by Amaury Delerue.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
Throw-in for Lyon in the half of Nimes.
Throw-in high up the field for Lyon in Lyon.
In the minute 44, Lyon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Lyon close to the penalty box.
Maxence Caqueret (Lyon) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Nimes push forward at Groupama Stadium and Zinedine Ferhat gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Lyon defence.
In the minute 45, Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
The first-half is over.
The second-half has started.
Throw-in for Nimes at Groupama Stadium.
In the minute 46, Karl Toko Ekambi is replacing Maxwel Cornet for Lyon at Groupama Stadium.
Nimes make their second substitution with Nolan Roux replacing Haris Duljevic.
Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Lyon.
In the minute 47, Nimes's Andres Cubas has been booked in Lyon.
Nimes needs to be cautious. Lyon have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 49, It's a goal kick for the away team in Lyon.
Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Nimes close to the penalty box.
In the minute 52, Leo Dubois (Lyon) gets a yellow card.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 56, Florian Miguel for Nimes drives towards goal at Groupama Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Rudi Garcia (Lyon) is making a second substitution, with Sinaly Diomande replacing Leo Dubois.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
Ball goes out of play for a Nimes goal kick.
In the minute 59, Jerome Arpinon is making the team's first substitution at Groupama Stadium with Matteo Ahlinvi replacing Sidy Sarr.
Lyon to take a throw-in in Nimes territory.
Amaury Delerue awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 62, Lyon have been awarded a corner by Amaury Delerue.
Nimes have a goal kick.
Jean Lucas is on a sub for Maxence Caqueret for Lyon.
In the minute 64, Lamine Fomba for Nimes gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Amaury Delerue awards Lyon a goal kick.
Can Nimes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lyon's half?
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Lyon in their own half.
Amaury Delerue awards Lyon a goal kick.
Nimes have a goal kick.
In the minute 68, Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
Lamine Fomba (Nimes) has received a first yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lyon.
In the minute 70, Lyon have been awarded a corner by Amaury Delerue.
Jean Lucas (Lyon) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Amaury Delerue signals a Lyon throw-in in Nimes's half.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Nimes in their own half.
Throw-in for Nimes in the half of Lyon.
In Lyon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
Nimes to take a throw-in in Lyon territory.
Goal kick for Nimes at Groupama Stadium.
In the minute 78, Bruno Guimaraes gets his shot on target but fails to score for Lyon.
Ball goes out of play for a Nimes goal kick.
Throw-in Nimes.
In the minute 81, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Zinedine Ferhat.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
Zinedine Ferhat has recovered and rejoins the match in Lyon.
In the minute 85, Lyon have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Lyon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nimes's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lyon.
Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, The home team have replaced Rayan Cherki with Tino Kadewere. This is the fourth substitution made today by Rudi Garcia.
Renaud Ripart is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Important block from the Nimes defence as Moussa Dembele fires in a strike for Lyon.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Amaury Delerue.
Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
Amaury Delerue will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Nimes’s Renaud Ripart is on his feet again at Groupama Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sinaly Diomande (Lyon) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Nimes goal kick.
Amaury Delerue signals a Nimes throw-in in Lyon's half.
Lyon have a goal kick.
Amaury Delerue signals a free kick to Nimes in their own half.
Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
Amaury Delerue blows to end the match. The final score is 0-0.
Jean Lucas for Lyon has been booked by Amaury Delerue and receives a first yellow card.
Lucas Buades is replacing Nolan Roux for the away team.
